short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power of Filo, now on your desktop. Clear all your questions and concepts on a live 1-on-1 call! Connect to a tutor in 60 seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Filo's Instant Ask Button for Chrome – a game-changing tool that empowers you to ask any question on the web, including right from Google search results!

World's only live instant tutoring platform. Clear your questions & concepts at a click of a button! Connect to a tutor in 60 secs!
Now get connected to a tutor on a live 1-on-1 call even on the web. Ask any question or clear any concept you are facing a problem in 24X7.

With just one click, access Filo's expert tutors to help you unravel even the most challenging concepts. Make your browsing experience more productive and enhance your learning journey, all within your favourite browser.

More than 2.2 million students across 15+ countries are using Filo to clear concepts, solve problems, do revisions, and do examination preparation and homework.
We will provide you with access to over 50,000+ tutors across the world!

➤ How does it work?
Whenever you are not able to understand a question or a concept simply click on Filo's chrome extension and get an instant solution from an expert at a click of a button!
› Go to the Filo chrome extension and activate it› Just look for the "Ask on Filo" button and click on it
› Login and get connected to a tutor in 60 seconds

An innovative tool that lets you upload question images or type your queries directly within the plugin. Enjoy seamless integration with popular education websites like Brainly, Toppr, Byju's and many more!

➤ Why Filo benefits students:
› Designed for individual learning abilities
› Ecosystem of tutors & students, powered by tech
› Snap/upload question to connect with tutor in 60s
› Real-time explanations, steps, & solutions
› Personalised video call sessions with experts
› Clarify steps & concepts during the call
› Ask unlimited questions for complete understanding

We cater to students in grades 6-12, covering subjects such as Math, Science, English, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and more. Our platform supports a wide range of textbooks, helping students clear their concepts anytime during the day. Filo is the easiest way to prepare for competitive exams and excel in academics, regardless of your location or curriculum.
